name: Oath of the Ancients
description: Paladins of the Ancients defend life, light, and the natural order against encroaching darkness.

3.name: Oath Spells
3.description: You always have certain spells prepared at specific paladin levels.

7.name: Aura of Warding
7.description: You and allies take reduced damage from spells.

15.name: Undying Sentinel
15.description: You resist being reduced to 0 HP and ignore aging effects.

20.name: Elder Champion
20.description: You assume an ancient form that regenerates health and empowers spells.
